item.title: Raphael Senghaas
item.description: I am currently a master student in physics of Prof. Dr. Johannes Walcher at Universität Heidelberg. I’m part of the STRUCTURES YRC. My research interests include Mathematical Physics and Algebraic Geometry (see Research). From August 2019 until June 2020, I studied at the Tsinghua University in Beijing. I’m a member of the Eomii team since April 2022.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Help-Desk Tutor (Analysis 2 & Linear Algebra 2) SS22 Teaching Assistant String Theory WS21/22 Tutor Algebra II SS21 Tutor Linear Algebra I WS20/21
